06035344-ea68-49c7-8768-7a7b1824dff3.name: 硬皮
06035344-ea68-49c7-8768-7a7b1824dff3.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

234a3058-1557-48a0-bb08-c1fd342dd76a.name: 高痛阈
234a3058-1557-48a0-bb08-c1fd342dd76a.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

c148aa84-1a20-46ac-943d-1b272dcd5fa6.name: 视力不良（远视）
c148aa84-1a20-46ac-943d-1b272dcd5fa6.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

8eed3c7a-5f95-45ec-a7a9-62cf41882b71.name: 氧气储存
8eed3c7a-5f95-45ec-a7a9-62cf41882b71.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 25 倍

0b117042-362b-430f-86b5-ce67a3c2ab48.name: 氧气储存
0b117042-362b-430f-86b5-ce67a3c2ab48.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 50 倍

3d2c5cbf-f191-4d0c-94f1-a25403c87d78.name: 氧气储存
3d2c5cbf-f191-4d0c-94f1-a25403c87d78.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 100 倍

3d8ebeba-6236-4f39-82f7-1be38ae0e6eb.name: 氧气储存
3d8ebeba-6236-4f39-82f7-1be38ae0e6eb.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 200 倍

073e3957-ad92-4dc6-ad80-2f767d8d5cc5.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 300 倍

bc8081f3-0f72-4ce6-b7e1-7fef7658e2ea.name: 增强时间感
bc8081f3-0f72-4ce6-b7e1-7fef7658e2ea.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

30c7b4b3-def6-487d-937c-bc8ee7916cc8.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

03b54e4d-9852-494e-b357-e686a82951d5.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points
